title: Replace profile photo with LinkedIn image URL

requirements.text: In HeroSection.tsx, replace the current profile image src with the external LinkedIn URL: https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/v2/D4D03AQG_vKIcM3o7oQ/profile-displayphoto-scale_400_400/B4DZw8fRO0HwAg-/0/1770541359476?e=1773878400&v=beta&t=hNLsHkQFnEh-Boegm1kbBhX7F8v1P42PUa-DT2DJzkk. The target element is the at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/img[1] (the profile photo in the Hero section). Update the img src to point directly to this LinkedIn URL, retaining all existing alt text, className, and fallback/error handling logic.
acceptanceCriteria: The profile photo in the Hero section displays the image from the provided LinkedIn URL.
No other images or elements on the page are affected.
Existing alt text, CSS classes, and error/fallback handling on the img element are preserved.
The change is limited to the img element at the specified XPath in HeroSection.tsx.

constraints: Only modify the img element identified by XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/img[1] in HeroSection.tsx.
Do not alter any other component, layout, or styling.
nonGoals: Downloading or saving the LinkedIn image as a local static asset.
Changing any other section or component of the CV.
